context: i now know that there is a separate disc for the dlcs, but do i need xbox live to download and play them?
response: Your XBox needs to be connected to internet and have a standard XBox Live account (free) only to do online purchases or download any free games or DLC's.  If you have game and DLC disc, you are ready to play it.

context: can this controller be used for all ps3 games
